titles.title: Airport Security Personnel Standards Act
To amend title 49, United States Code, concerning employment standards for airport security personnel.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.

bill.summary: 9/26/1996--Introduced. Airport Security Personnel Standards Act - Amends Federal aviation law to require employment standards for air carrier and airport security personnel to include requirements for law enforcement or military training for airline and airport security personnel.
